anime.name: Fairy Tail
anime.info: Lucy is a 17-year-old girl, who wants to be a full-fledged mage. One day when visiting Harujion Town, she meets Natsu, a young man who gets sick easily by any type of transportation. But Natsu isn't just any ordinary kid, he's a member of one of the world's most infamous mage guilds: Fairy Tail.
#2: "S.O.W. Sense of Wonder" (S.O.W.センスオブワンダー) by Idoling!!! (eps 12-24)
#5: "Egao no Mahō" (エガオノマホウ) by MAGIC PARTY (eps 49-60)
#9: "Towa no Kizuna" (永久のキズナ) by Daisy x Daisy (eps 99-111)
#11: "Hajimari no Sora" (はじまりの空; "Sky of Beginning") by +Plus (eps 125-137)
#12: "Tenohira" (テノヒラ; "Palm of the Hand") by HERO (eps 138-)
#14: "Fairy Tail ~Yakusoku no Hi~" (フェアリーテイル~約束の日~; Fairy Tail ~The Promised Day~) by Chihiro Yonekura (eps 167-)
#1: "Kanpeki gu~no ne" (完璧ぐ～のね) by Watarirouka Hashiri Tai (eps 1-11)
#2: "Tsuioku Merry-Go-Round" (追憶メリーゴーランド) by onelifecrew (eps 12-24)
#3: "Gomen ne, Watashi." (ごめんね, 私。) by Shiho Nanba (eps 25-35)
#4: "Kimi ga Iru Kara" (君がいるから) by Mikuni Shimokawa (eps 36-)
#7: "Hitori Samishiku" (ひとりさみしく) by ShaNa (eps 73-85)
#9: "Kono Te Nobashite" (この手を伸ばして; "Reach Out This Hand") by Hi-Fi Camp (eps 99-)
#10: "Boys Be Ambitious!!" (ボーイズ・ビー・アンビシャス) by Hi-Fi Camp
#11: "Glitter" (Starving Trancer Remix) by Another Infinity feat. Mayumi Morinaga (eps 125-137)
#12: "Yell ~Kagayaku Tame no Mono~" (YELL～輝くためのもの～; "The Thing For Shining") by Sata Andagi (eps 138-)
#13: "Kimi ga Kureta Mono" (キミがくれたもの; "What you gave me") by Shizuka Kudo

episode.title: So No One Sees the Tears
A Flower Blooms in the Rain

And so, We Aim for the Top

On a Night of Falling Stars
Grudges are Wrapped in the Silence of the Night
The Perfume I dedicate to You!
